Name: Kio's Adventure
About the game: 'Kio's Adventure' tells the story about a high school girl named Kio suddenly goes to a different world which is surrounded by organs and monsters after a wired earthquake. Players need to help Kio escape this horrible world. The game artwork uses 16bit pixel style. The contents of the game is full of horror decryption and other strange elements, and the game has a lot of bloody scenes which may cause the player uneasy. Please be sure you are over 18 years old to play this game.
